revised_title: Aeronautical Aerodynamics: Effects of Groups of Buildings and Wind Tunnel Investigations
tldr: This article discusses the aerodynamics of groups of buildings and the effects of wind on urban environments. It presents case studies and wind tunnel investigations to understand the air flow patterns and wind speeds around buildings. The research provides a design method for planning the layout of small groups of buildings and offers insights into future research needs.
scientific_discipline: Environmental and Earth Sciences > Urban Planning and Design
